Package automaton

Class JeuDeLaVie

java.lang.Object
automaton.JeuDeLaVie
Record Components:
observers - list of observers.
commands - list of commands.
visitor - attached visitor.
xMax - maximal size of the grid on X axis.
yMax - maximal size of the grid on Y axis.
density - density of living cells. Double between 0 and 1.
grid - main grid of the game.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observed
public class JeuDeLaVie extends Object implements Observed
One of the main classes of Game Of Life. This class is responsible of algorithmic part of the game.

      public void initializeGrid()
